column2: Starting with the second quarter 2018 release, the debt service ratio table 36-10-0435 (formerly CANSIM 380-0073) will be published in the quarterly release of the Financial and Wealth Accounts in table 11-10-0065: National Balance Sheet Accounts, debt service indicators, households on September 14, 2018.
Property incomes are adjusted for the cost of financial services indirectly measured.
